vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.16;
son of: Gad (H1410);
brother of: Ziphion (H6837), Haggi (H2291), Shuni (H7764), Ezbon (H0675), Arod (H0720) and Areli (H0692)
Group of e.ri (עֵרִי "Eri" H6179)
§ Erites = see Erites "watchful"
descendants of Eri, the son of Gad
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Gad; (b)   descendiente de Er; tribu de Gad
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見 以利 "警惕的"
迦得的兒子以利的後裔(民 26:16)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以利族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见 以利 "警惕的"
迦得的儿子以利的后裔(民 26:16)
